intro: Euphrasia marilaunica, commonly known as the Marilaunica eyebright, is a flowering plant native to parts of Europe and Asia. It belongs to the Scrophulariaceae family and is characterized by its small, yellowish-orange flowers that bloom in early summer. The plant typically grows in moist, shady environments such as woodlands and meadows. Its leaves are lance-shaped and covered in fine hairs, while its flowers are clustered in dense spikes. Euphrasia marilaunica is often used in traditional herbal medicine for its purported eye health benefits.
